description: When Gunslinger makes a successfull ranged strike against an enemy within their reach with a one-handed firearm or one-handed crossbow, trigger adds aux effect that makes enemy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against their next melee attack with a one-handed melee weapn
name: Sword and Pistol (Attack Rolled, Ranged)

description: Checks if melee attack is made with a one-handed weapon. If the target is subject to Sword and Pistol it will be offguard.
name: Sword and Pistol (Attack Rolled, Melee)

description: Checks if damage taken is from a valid Sword and Pistol melee attack and removes the associated effects.
name: Sword and Pistol (Damage Taken)

description: Dedicated subtrigger for removing Sword and Pistol related effects.
name: Remove Sword and Pistol
